About Me

Let me tell You about what I do ..

Ask me about any project


First of all , I enjoy writing code. I started my journey with Javascript and I remember the moment when I could produce the output to the console saying ,, Hello World'. It's really awesome how by coding You can solve so many practical problems. Programming is a very powerfull skill that I think everyone in the future will have to know.
At the moment I am freelancing creating resposive websites using HTML,CSS & JAVASCRIPT.
In my free time I also code and learn new coding skills. I try to put all my projects on Github and I create my side projects to challange myself in aspects like: creativity, organization, problem solving.

Technical Skills

Html & CSS ( including SASS. Grid & Flexbox )

Javascrtipt & Jquery

MongoDB
